title: Generative AI in Utilities Market is estimated to be USD 8676 Mn by 2032 with a CAGR of 33.1% - Enterprise Apps Today
summary: Scientists have developed a new type of solar cell that is more efficient and less expensive than traditional solar cells. The new solar cell is made from a perovskite material, which is a type of crystal that can absorb light and convert it into electricity. Perovskite solar cells have the potential to revolutionize the solar energy industry.
